Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dipc

Class DataInterfacePushControlClientSidePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.helpers.AbstractClientSidePlugin
        • fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dipc.DataInterfacePushControlClientSidePlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PluginI, PushControlImplementationI, ClientSidePluginI, java.io.Serializable
    public class DataInterfacePushControlClientSidePlugin
extends AbstractClientSidePlugin
implements PushControlImplementationI
    The class DataInterfacePushControlClientSidePlugin implements the client-side role in this plug-in.

    Description

    See the package documentation for detailed explanations.

    Invariant

     invariant      true

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean currentlyPushesData​(java.lang.String portURI)
      return true if a series of pushes are done on the port.
      PushControlOutboundPort getOutboundPort()
      return the outbound port managed by this plug-in or null if it has not been created yet; should be overridden with the precise return type of the actual outbound port required interface to ease the calling of this interface methods.
      boolean isPortExisting​(java.lang.String portURI)
      return true if the owner component has a data offered inbound port of the given URI.
      void startLimitedPushing​(java.lang.String portURI, long interval, int n)
      start, after interval period of time, n pushes of data and force the pushes to be done each interval period of time.
      void startUnlimitedPushing​(java.lang.String portURI, long interval)
      start, after interval period of time, the pushing of data and force the pushes to be done indefinitely each interval period of time.
      void stopPushing​(java.lang.String portURI)
      stop the pushing of data on the given port.
